Html:
Hi,

Is it possible to plot real time graph with max 100000 points to plot and refresh rate for the graph will be minimum 500ms to 1 second, with dynamic data display tool.
And with this criteria what will be the perfomance of application in terms of CPU usage and Memory consumption?


Thanks,
Pallavi

Hi
I run something similar with updates every 500ms for 10 hours (about 75000 points) with about 10 windows each window holds one or two charts
So yes it is possible

Although optimization needs to be considered i.e. don't draw all the points only the changes my mechanism draws a point every second or every change
Roey
